description.value: You can prepare yourself for the incoming trauma, receiving 1d8 + your Constitution bonus temporary hit points that endure until the start of your next turn. If you are an expert in Fortitude saves, increase this by 1d8. If you are a master in Fortitude saves, instead by 2d8, and if you are legendary in Fortitude saves, you gain 20 + your Constitution bonus instead.

source.value: Ponyfinder: Races of Everglow Second Edition
